definitions.definition: Something taught by a religious or philosophical authority.
definitions.example: Many follow the teachings of Confucius.
Teaching has seen continual changes over the past decades.

definitions.definition: To show (someone) the way; to guide, conduct; to point, indicate.
definitions.example: ‘The bliss is there’, mumbled the old man and taught to Heaven.
Can you teach me to sew?  Can you teach sewing to me?

definitions.definition: To pass on knowledge, especially as one's profession; to act as a teacher.
definitions.example: She used to teach at university.

definitions.definition: (ditransitive) To cause to learn or understand.
(ditransitive) To cause to know the disagreeable consequences of some action.
definitions.example: I'll teach you to make fun of me!
